This document is the API specification of the Directory SDK for Java, version 4.1.

This document is the API specification of the Directory SDK for Java, version 4.1.

In addition to the packages listed above, the SDK also provides the following command line utilities:

LDAPSearch
LDAPModify
LDAPDelete
